name: Tape Escape!
description:
Tape Escape!

On the stormy shores of Breaker Island, a prisoner will break all the rules to secure his freedom!

Controls:
Arrows: Move and Jump
Z: Interact

Information:
A game built by Chris Kellett, Daniel Hookins, and Haydn Smith for Jame Gam #16. If you have trouble playing the game, you may watch the playthrough video instead :)

Game Jam Theme and Special Object
Theme: Break the Rules
Special Object: Duct Tape
